title: Dense fog in North India disrupts air traffic; 29 flights cancelled at Hyderabad airport on December 16
content: The affected flights were operating on routes connecting Hyderabad with major cities including Delhi, Mumbai, Patna, Ahmedabad, Pune, Goa, Bhubaneswar, Bangalore, Chennai and Madurai

title: IFFK 2025: Four out of 19 films awaiting Centre’s clearance granted permission for screening
content: Remaining 15 films awaiting clearance include Sergei Eisenstein's 100-year-old classic Battleship Potemkin and several films related to Palestine conflict

title: Telangana’s Mahabubnagar to host ‘Innovation Panchayat’ on December 20
content: An initiative of Telangana Innovation Cell, the panchayat is designed to be a direct walk-in platform bridging geographical gap between innovators and support they require

title: Worker killed, another critically injured in furnace mishap at steel factory in Medak
content: Both workers were standing near the furnace when it likely developed a puncture, causing molten metal to suddenly gush out and fall on them, police said

title: Lok Sabha refers Bill to set up higher education commission to joint committee of Parliament
content: The joint committee will comprise 21 members of the Lok Sabha and 10 from the Rajya Sabha. The proposed committee will submit its report by the last day of the first part of the 2026 Budget Session

title: Seven-year-old girl dies after being pushed from fourth floor in Malkajgiri
content: Police said preliminary investigation suggested that the accused was suffering from mental health issues, though the exact motive behind the act is yet to be established

title: Kabaddi player Rana Balachauria shot dead in the middle of tournament in Mohali
content: On any enmity angle or gang rivalry behind the killing, the police said, “The matter is under investigation”

title: National Herald case: Modi government's illegality fully exposed, says Congress
content: “The court in Delhi has ruled that the ED case is without jurisdiction; it has no FIR, without which there is no case,” says Congress leader Supriya Shrinate

title: Funds amounting to ₹988 crore released to Andhra under MGNREGA: Pemmasani Chandra Sekhar
content: Pemmasani Chandra Sekhar said the release would ensure timely wage payments to rural workers and strengthen livelihood security across Andhra Pradesh

title: 2016 dacoity case: Thane court acquits nine accused under MCOCA
content: "Mere collection of copies of previous charge-sheets and according to the sanction order u/s 23(2) of the Act are not sufficient to prove the offence under Section 3 of the MCOCA," says Special Judge (for MCOCA cases) V.G. Mohite

title: Murder bid accused on run for 5 years arrested in Palghar
content: The accused and his mother also allegedly threatened a local businessman with dire consequences, a police release said

title: Congress questions Centre after Lok Sabha says no Nehru papers missing from PMML
content: Union Culture Minister Gajendra Singh Shekhawat said this in a written response to a query in the Lok Sabha by BJP MP Sambit Patra

title: Pakistan’s 'unique way' of respecting people's will is jailing PM, giving lifetime immunity to army chief: India at UNSC
content: India also rejected the Pakistani envoy's assertion that the issue of Jammu and Kashmir should be settled in accordance with the UN Charter, relevant Security Council resolutions and the will of the Kashmiri people

title: Affront to non-Hindi speaking people: Chidambaram slams use of Hindi words in Bills' names
content: “The non-Hindi-speaking people cannot identify a Bill/Act with titles that are in Hindi words written in English letters, and they cannot pronounce them,” says P. Chidambaram

title: Male-centric rules deny SC children right to education in Karnataka
content: In Karnataka, children need a caste certificate in their own name, verified using a father’s TC and caste certificate. Without these, applications and linked scholarships can be rejected

title: WhatsApp users’ consent mandatory for collection of data, says NCLAT
content: Meta Platforms and WhatsApp challenged this order before the NCLAT, which, in January this year, passed an interim order, staying the five-year ban imposed by the CCI on data-sharing practices between WhatsApp and Meta for advertising purposes

title: EC publishes draft electoral rolls, list of deleted voters in Bengal under SIR 2026
content: The list features voters whose names were included in the electoral rolls of the state in 2025 but were deleted from the draft rolls of 2026

title: Soldier dies in landmine blast in J&K's Kupwara
content: “Havildar Zubair Ahmad of the Army's 13 Jammu and Kashmir Light Infantry was injured in a land mine blast at Putaha Khan Gali in the Trehgam area of the border district on December 15, 2025,” says officials

title: Vijay Diwas 2025: PM Modi, President Murmu pay homage to 1971 war soldiers; Congress hails Indira Gandhi leadership
content: President Droupadi Murmu also paid homage to soldiers who helped the country secure victory over Pakistan in the 1971 War

title: At least 13 dead, 35 injured in Yamuna Expressway pile-up; buses catch fire
content: At least seven buses and three smaller vehicles collided with each other in the dense fog around 4.30 a.m.

title: Parliament Winter session Day 12 LIVE: Opposition condemns erasure of Mahatma Gandhi's name from 'VB- G Ram G' Bill
content: 'Sabka Bima Sabka Raksha Bill echoes BJP slogans', says Opposition as Centre introduced Bill in Lok Sabha to amend India's insurance laws

title: Opposition boycotts Chhattisgarh Assembly proceedings over paddy procurement issue
content: Congress members alleged that the scale of mismanagement and the problems faced by farmers since the beginning of the season were unprecedented

title: 25 years later, Uttarakhand Police arrest key accused in Himgiri Plantation fraud case
content: “Two brothers had formed a company, Himgiri Plantation, in 1993. They promised investors attractive returns, including doubling their money in a short span,” says the complainant

title: Goa nightclub fire: Thai authorities deport Luthra brothers to India
content: The deportation comes amid an ongoing probe into the deadly blaze, which triggered widespread outrage and led to scrutiny over alleged safety violations and lapses by the nightclub management

title: Inhalable microplastics, a hidden toxin worsening Indian cities’ air
content: A first-of-its-kind study has examined inhalable microplastics in four Indian cities. These are plastic particles smaller than 10 µm, which researchers have warned can also smuggle in toxic co-pollutants such as heavy metals and hormone-disrupting compounds

title: Caught in a Limbo: Unfinished ramps delay full benefits of double-decker flyover, rotary flyover at Baiyappanahalli fails to take off
content: Despite the commissioning of Namma Metro’s Yellow Line, large sections of the double-decker flyover that runs alongside the elevated corridor remain incomplete, continuing to test the patience of thousands of daily commuters

title: Singapore High Commission’s advisory on air pollution triggers war of words
content: The advisory posted by Singapore High Commissioner Simon Wong on X urged Singapore nationals in the Delhi National Capital Region to pay heed to restrictions imposed under Stage IV of the Graded Response Action Plan in Delhi

title: Army celebrates Vijay Diwas, hails indigenous technology
content: The Defence Ministry said the celebrations highlighted the Indian Army’s steady transformation into a modern, innovative and self-reliant force

title: Act against Oppn. MLAs behind interference in power projects of national importance in Kishtwar: Omar Abdullah
content: “It should be viewed seriously. These are institutions of national importance and no interference should be allowed. Such projects are not just for J&K but the entire country,” said Omar Abdullah

title: Why full audio clip on Manipur violence was not sent to forensics, asks SC
content: The top court said it was a “little disturbed” by the affidavit filed on behalf of the petitioners that “states to the effect that only select clippings were sent” for forensics

title: Minimum temperature in Telangana likely to dip by 3-4°C over next two days
content: According to data from Telangana Development Planning Society, between December 14 and 15, seven districts in the State recorded minimum temperatures of 10°C or below with Sirpur in Kumaram Bheem Asifabad district recording the lowest minimum temperature of 7.6°C.

title: India-Jordan ties: Crown Prince drives PM Modi to museum as special gesture — see pics
content: Jordan's Crown Prince Al Hussein bin Abdullah II personally drove Prime Minister Narendra Modi to the Jordan Museum, a significant gesture during Modi's visit marking 75 years of diplomatic ties. The two-day trip, aimed at boosting bilateral relations, includes discussions with King Abdullah II on various aspects of India-Jordan cooperation and regional issues.

title: IPL Auction Day Buzz: Venkatesh Iyer sends timely reminder; smashes quick-fire 70 in SMAT
content: Venkatesh Iyer delivered a commanding 70 off 43 balls in the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy, just hours before the IPL 2026 Auction. Released by KKR after a record price tag last season, his fluent knock highlighted his value as a proven Indian match-winner, potentially reigniting strong franchise interest.

title: Party, police, panic: Woman jumps off 4th floor to escape cops visiting Bengaluru hotel
content: A 21-year-old woman sustained serious injuries after allegedly jumping from a hotel's fourth floor shortly after police arrived to address a nuisance complaint. Allegations of police misconduct, including a bribe demand, have surfaced, which authorities deny, stating videography is standard procedure. The woman's father has filed a complaint against the hotel for negligence.

title: Wealth milestone: Elon Musk makes history; becomes first person worth $600 billion
content: Elon Musk has achieved a historic net worth of $600 billion, driven by the soaring valuations of SpaceX and Tesla. SpaceX's potential public offering at an $800 billion valuation significantly boosted Musk's fortune. He believes AI and robotics will eventually make money obsolete by satisfying all human needs.

title: 4 dead in Agra-Lucknow Expressway crash: Speeding Furtuner overturns near Unnao; what led to mishap
content: A tragic accident occurred on the Agra-Lucknow Expressway. A speeding Fortuner car overturned near kilometre 241 in Unnao district. The vehicle crashed into boulders obscured by fog, leading to a sudden tyre burst. Four people lost their lives in the early morning incident. Police are working to identify the fourth victim. The accident happened around 5:15 AM.

title: National Herald case: Relief for Rahul, Sonia; court refuses to take cognisance of ED chargesheet
content: A Delhi court refused to take cognizance of a fresh FIR in the National Herald case, stating the probe stems from a private complaint, not an FIR.  Rahul and Sonia Gandhi are not entitled to FIR copies at this stage. The ED can continue its investigation. Congress accused the BJP of vendetta, while the BJP dismissed the claims as baseless.

title: Microsoft’s warning on AI risks: AI chief says won’t develop unsafe systems; sets strict safety rules
content: Microsoft's AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman declared the company will halt development of any AI system that risks becoming uncontrollable, emphasizing a "humanist superintelligence" approach. This stance comes as Microsoft gains independence in AI development following a new OpenAI agreement, prioritizing safety and human interests over a rapid race to superintelligence.

title: Historic low! Rupee breaches 91-mark to record all-time low against US dollar
content: The Indian rupee hit an all-time low, breaching 91 against the US dollar amid sustained foreign fund outflows and trade uncertainty. The currency extended its losing streak, weakening significantly in recent sessions. Analysts anticipate continued pressure due to delayed trade deals and FII outflows, though a weaker dollar or RBI intervention could offer support.

title: Gurgaon: Overspeeding bike attempts risky overtake, crashes into cab - video
content: A speeding biker suffered injuries on NH-8 near Ambience Mall after an alleged unsafe overtaking maneuver. Footage from another rider's helmet camera captured the Suzuki Hayabusa at high velocity before the crash. The rider admitted to overspeeding and wrong-side overtaking, leading to no formal case registration. Traffic police urge adherence to rules on this accident-prone stretch.

title: EC releases Bengal draft rolls: 58L names deleted; how to check voter status and restore it
content: The Election Commission has released a list of over 58 lakh voters removed from the rolls. These deletions are due to voters being untraceable, deceased, or duplicates. Citizens can check their names online or through Booth Level Officers. Those missing can apply to re-register.

title: Match made in cybercrime heaven! Man poses as 'dream bride', dupes 10 friends; arrested
content: A Sabarkantha man defrauded his friends by posing as a woman online. He lured bachelors seeking brides with fake marriage proposals. The accused, Ankush Patel, collected over Rs 5 lakh from one victim over two years. Police investigations reveal at least 10 other friends were similarly cheated. The accused allegedly used the money to repay debts.

title: Interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS approaches Earth on Dec 19: Viewing tips and other important info
content: Interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS, discovered in July, will approach Earth on December 19th. This rare visitor from another star system, unlike typical comets, offers scientists a unique chance to analyze its composition. Studying the dust and gas released as it nears the Sun could reveal secrets about other planetary systems' evolution. It will be observable via telescopes.

title: Rob and Michele’s murder: What happened at Conan O’Brien’s party hours before they died?
content: A festive holiday party turned tragic as director Rob Reiner and his wife Michele reportedly had a public, heated argument with their son Nick. Hours later, the couple was found dead in their home, and Nick, who has a history of mental illness and substance abuse, was arrested on suspicion of their murder.

title: Trump tariff pressure fails? India’s exports at 6-month high, shipments to US go up - top facts
content: India's exports surged 19.4% in November, defying US tariffs, with shipments to China and the US showing significant growth. Engineering and electronics goods led the rise. The trade deficit narrowed to a five-month low as imports of gold and crude oil declined. This resilience highlights market diversification and sector strength.

title: Nvidia responds to DeepSeek report; denies claims of ‘banned’ chips behind Jan market rout
content: Nvidia has denied reports that Chinese AI startup DeepSeek is using smuggled Blackwell GPUs, calling the claims "far-fetched." The US has restricted these advanced chips from export to China to maintain its AI lead. DeepSeek's earlier AI model launch at a lower cost had already raised concerns about China's rapid progress.

title: U19 Asia Cup: Vaibhav Suryavanshi blazes to quick fifty; falls to stunning catch
content: Teenage sensation Vaibhav Suryavanshi showcased his explosive power-hitting in the ACC U19 Asia Cup, smashing a rapid fifty off 25 balls against Malaysia. Despite an early setback, his aggressive strokeplay provided a crucial boost. This follows his remarkable 171 against UAE, solidifying his status as a bright young talent.

title: Pariksha Pe Charcha 2026: Millions register, but few meet the PM; here's how it works
content: Pariksha Pe Charcha, PM Modi’s annual interaction with students, is scheduled for January 2026. With registrations now crossing 40 lakh, the scale is massive. But signing up does not mean getting a seat at the main event. This explainer breaks down who can participate, how the online selection works, and how a small final group is chosen for the on-ground interaction.

title: IND vs SA: Breather from run-fests? Why low-scoring T20Is are India's comfort zone
content: With the batting lacking consistency, the team may be forced to draw up bowler-centric strategies heading into the T20 World Cup, especially since many of India’s recent wins have been set up by their potent bowling attack

title: Handcuffed and pinned to the ground: Photos emerge of son's arrest in Reiner's murder
content: Nick Reiner, son of the late director Rob Reiner, has been arrested by the LAPD as the "main suspect" in the alleged murders of his parents, Rob and Michele Reiner. Their bodies were discovered at their Brentwood home with knife-related lacerations. Nick Reiner was apprehended and booked for murder.

title: Blake Lively calls Taylor Swift 'the dreamiest friend' amid Eras Tour buzz
content: Blake Lively celebrated a business venture amid reports of a strained friendship with Taylor Swift. Swift is reportedly "hurt" and feels used due to Lively's legal issues involving her "It Ends with Us" co-star. Lively's social media post focused on her haircare brand collaboration, pointedly avoiding any mention of Swift, highlighting a careful navigation of public perception and personal relationships.

title: MLB trade rumors: Braves eye $325M Rangers star to boost title odds
content: Atlanta Braves are reportedly exploring a blockbuster trade for Texas Rangers star Corey Seager, a move that could significantly alter the NL playoff landscape. Despite Seager's hefty contract and a no-trade clause, the Braves see him as a crucial solution for their shortstop woes. This potential deal offers Atlanta elite offense and Texas a chance to rebuild their farm system.

title: Where does Auston Matthews live? Inside Leafs star’s homes and lifestyle
content: Auston Matthews' net worth is estimated at $30 million in 2025, driven by his substantial NHL salary and lucrative endorsement deals with major brands like Nike and RBC. Beyond hockey, he has strategically invested in startups and actively supports men's health through philanthropy, showcasing a multi-faceted financial profile.

title: 'Dhurandhar': Secret behind Ranveer's Hazma Ali Mazari’s look
content: Makeup and character design artist Preetisheel Singh detailed the meticulous process of crafting Ranveer Singh's distinct look for his spy character, Hamza Ali Mazari, in 'Dhurandhar.'  Focusing on minute details like hair texture, freckles, and tanned skin, she ensured a clear visual distinction from his previous role as Khilji, with each transformation taking up to 1.5 hours.

title: 'She said yes': Donald Trump Jr. announces engagement to Bettina Anderson — Watch
content: Donald Trump Jr. announced his engagement to model Bettina Anderson during a White House Christmas reception.  The 47-year-old shared his surprise and joy after Anderson accepted his proposal. Anderson expressed her gratitude and called it the most unforgettable weekend of her life.

title: Goa nightclub fire: Luthra brothers deported from Thailand; Dec 6 blaze claimed 25 lives
content: Goa's Birch nightclub co-owners, Saurabh and Gaurav Luthra, wanted in connection with a fire that killed 25, are being deported from Thailand to India. They fled after the blaze, had their passports suspended, and were detained. Indian agencies are facilitating their return to face charges and questioning.

title: Watch: Mexico City lawmakers pull hair, elbow, slap during debate - what led to the drama?
content: Chaos erupted in Mexico City's Congress as women legislators from opposing parties engaged in a physical brawl, broadcast live. The clash, involving hair-pulling and blows, stemmed from a protest by the right-wing PAN party against the ruling Morena party's alleged rule-breaking during a transparency agency reform debate. The opposition was forcibly removed, leading to a resumed session without their presence.

title: Gold price prediction today: Where are prices headed this week & will rally continue?
content: Gold price prediction today: Gold prices are poised for a rise, supported by a weak rupee and a dovish Federal Reserve. Despite some volatility, the yellow metal found strength from the Fed's rate cut and bond-buying plans.

title: UP road accident: Several buses catch fire on Delhi-Agra expressway after collision; 4 killed
content: In a shocking turn of events early Tuesday, the Delhi-Agra Expressway near Mathura witnessed a devastating blaze as multiple buses caught fire, raising concerns for those on board. The incident occurred amid a thick veil of smog engulfing Uttar Pradesh, which severely compromised visibility, even obscuring the majestic Taj Mahal.

title: BJP's Bihar power play continues: Sanjay Saraogi gets top job in state; who is he
content: Indian politics sees a fresh face in leadership as Sanjay Saraogi, a six-time MLA from Darbhanga, steps up as the new president of Bihar BJP, taking over from Dilip Kumar Jaiswal. With a robust background in the ABVP and a long-standing commitment to the party, Saraogi vows to bolster the party's framework in alignment with Prime Minister Modi's vision.

title: 'Always with her': Prithviraj, Supriya share survivor's post
content: Following the 2017 actress assault case verdict, actor Prithviraj Sukumaran and producer Supriya Menon publicly backed the survivor. Manju Warrier voiced her support, stating justice remains incomplete as the alleged mastermind walks free. She emphasized that true justice requires punishing all involved, advocating for the safety and dignity of all women.

title: Watch: US conducts strikes on 3 suspected narco-trafficking vessels; video shows 'kinetic strike'
content: The US military conducted a "lethal kinetic strike" on three suspected drug-trafficking vessels in the eastern Pacific, resulting in eight deaths. This operation, targeting organizations designated as terrorist groups, is part of Washington's intensified maritime campaign against narco-terrorist networks in the region.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens below 26,000; BSE Sensex down over 300 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in red on Tuesday on weak global cues. While Nifty50 went below 26,000, BSE Sensex was down over 300 points.

title: IPL 2026 dates confirmed: Season to run from March 26 to May 31
content: IPL 2026 is set to commence on March 26 and conclude on May 31, with the opening match potentially at Bengaluru's Chinnaswamy Stadium, pending government clearance. Franchise representatives met in Abu Dhabi to finalise these dates ahead of Tuesday's auction. The auction will feature a pool of 359 players, with marquee names like Cameron Green expected to fetch high bids.

title: ‘Sheltered killer of Moose Wala’: Gunmen pose for selfie, gun down kabaddi player; what police said
content: A kabaddi player and promoter was shot dead at a live tournament in Mohali after gunmen posed for selfies with him. The killing, claimed by a rival gang as revenge for Sidhu Moose Wala's murder, has raised concerns about Punjab's law and order. The attackers fled after firing several shots in the air.

title: 'Avengers: Doomsday' teaser trailers leaked online
content: Marvel's highly anticipated 'Avengers: Doomsday' trailer launch was marred by three leaks, igniting fan frenzy. Reports suggest Captain America's return as a father, Thor's potential demise leading to Valhalla, and Robert Downey Jr.'s dramatic debut as Doctor Doom, hinting at timeline disruptions and ambitious casting.

title: Top stocks to buy: Stock market recommendations for today - check list
content: Stock market recommendations: Mirae Asset Sharekhan's Somil Mehta suggests buying Union Bank of India, UPL, and Britannia Industries today, December 16, 2025.  These stocks are poised for an uptrend, showing positive momentum and consolidating near key moving averages.

title: In Kochi Corporation, Palluruthy is LDF’s only bright spot
content: The front performed relatively better in certain pockets and far worse in others across the four CPI(M) area committee limits within the civic body

title: ‘AQI’, ‘AQI’ chants greet CM Rekha Gupta at Messi event in smog-hit Delhi
content: A video showing a section of the crowd chanting 'AQI', 'AQI' has gone viral on social media, prompting the Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) to attack Ms. Gupta over the ‘severe’ pollution levels gripping the capital.

title: Kanchi Kamakoti Peetam moves Madras High Court to take back its elephants
content: Justice V. Lakshminarayanan directs Principal Chief Conservator of Forests-cum-Chief Wildlife Warden to inspect a 2.94 acre facility created by the Mutt at Konerikuppam to house the pachyderms

title: GI tag sought for Thoothukudi pearls
content: It highlights the cultural and symbolic significance of Thoothukudi pearls in Tamil tradition, where they were associated with purity, divinity and royal power. The pearls were traditionally used in temple offerings, royal ornaments and diplomatic gifts

title: City distillery Khoday rejigs its positioning in alcobev industry, after remaining sober for over a decade
content: To invest ₹50 crore to expand its distillery off Kanakpura Road, scale up production facilities in other parts of the country

title: Encounter on in Jammu’s Udhampur as security forces encircle a group of terrorists
content: A joint team of Special Operation Group along with the Army and the CRPF is on job, says a police spokesman

title: Identify land for Navodaya Vidyalayas, Supreme Court tells Tamil Nadu government
content: SC asks Centre and State to enter into mutual consultations; says State is at liberty to air its grievances

title: 103 firemen terminated over ‘compromised process of recruitment’ in J&K
content: ACB inquiry panel found “large-scale OMR sheet tampering, fabricated scanned images of answer sheets and illegal manipulation of merit list.

title: Supreme Court extends interim protection from arrest granted to actors in chit fund case
content: Top court says endorsement alone cannot make actors liable; interim relief to continue till investigation concludes

title: Bengaluru’s wastewater management may get Swiss tech boost
content: Bengaluru’s wastewater management systems may soon receive a global upgrade, with Swiss start-ups expressing interest in piloting advanced treatment technologies at the city’s sewage treatment plants

title: PM mourns death of Assam editor P.G. Baruah
content: Prafulla Gobinda Baruah, also the managing director of The Assam Tribune group, breathed his last on December 14 night

title: Potti Sriramulu’s house in Chennai will be developed as a memorial, says A.P. CM
content: Smruthi Vanam is being built in Amaravati where a statue of Sriramulu will be installed and named as the ‘Statue of Sacrifice’, says Naidu

title: Armed with objections against ward delimitation, legislators make a beeline to GHMC
content: Leaders from Congress, BRS, BJP raise concerns over voter imbalance, unclear criteria and lack of consultation with sitting legislators; over 1,300 suggestions received so far; December 17 set as deadline for submission of objections

title: Lokesh urges Centre to sanction 11 Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalayas to A.P.
content: The HRD Minister highlights the Guaranteed Foundational Literacy and Numeracy programme and Interactive Classroom Response System implemented in State

title: Two security personnel injured in IED blast in Chhattisgarh’s Bijapur
content: “During the operation, two Cobra personnel sustained minor injuries in an IED blast and have been sent to Raipur for better treatment,” a police said

title: Chennai-bound Vande Bharat Express chugs off from Narsapur
content: The train will halt at Bhimavaram Town, Gudivada, Vijayawada, Tenali, Ongole, Nellore and Renigunta before reaching MGR Chennai Central station

title: Air India CEO apologises to Congress MP
content: Senior Congress leader K.C. Venugopal moved a privilege motion against the Air India CEO Campbell Wilson in connection with a flight the former took in August

title: Watch: Senior Congress Leader Shamanur Shivashankarappa Passes Away
content: Veteran Congress leader and Davanagere South MLA Shamanur Shivashankarappa passed away on December 14, 2025, at the age of 94 due to age-related complications

title: Manipur BJP legislators’ Delhi meeting a crash course for students: Congress
content: A total of 34 MLAs, including some belonging to the Kuki community, took part in the meeting on Sunday

title: SHANTI Bill spurs private sector to make, run nuclear plants
content: The SHANTI Bill penalises operators in case of a nuclear accident, requiring them to compensate on the basis of the the size of plants operated and not the damage experienced in itself

title: Watch: Lionel Messi ends G.O.A.T. India Tour with grand Delhi finale
content: Lionel Messi brought his much-anticipated G.O.A.T. India Tour to a spectacular close in Delhi, thrilling thousands of fans after a chaotic start in Kolkata on December 13.

title: SIR process is based on Constitutional framework: Centre
content: Citing precedence, Law Minister says EC’s revision took place earlier too under various governments; Opposition continues criticism over exercise

title: PM Modi and Jordan’s King discuss bilateral ties, exchange perspectives on regional and global issues
content: The full-fledged bilateral visit to Jordan is taking place after 37 years, coinciding with the 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries

title: Calcutta HC to hear PILs on violence at Messi event; five spectators held
content: Petitioners have sought the court’s intervention in transferring the probe from the West Bengal Police to Central investigating agencies

title: LDF, UDF begin post-poll deliberations in Kozhikode
content: While the LDF has much to ponder over the drubbing in some of its traditional strongholds, the UDF is elated about the more-than-anticipated victory of its candidates across the district

title: Government proposes to send VBSA Bill to JPC
content: The Bill seeks to subsume the UGC, AICTE, NCTE, and separate funding from the regulatory body; the Opposition has slammed the Bill as an “attack on federalism”

title: Good communists voted for UDF, says Satheesan
content: Leader of the Opposition says a majority of Left fellow travellers aligned with the UDF  in the local body polls; UDF to shift its focus to Assembly elections from January

title: Thirupparankundram row: Tamil Nadu tells Madras High Court pillar belongs to Jains, not Hindus
content: A Division Bench of Justices G. Jayachandran and K.K. Ramakrishnan continued to hear the arguments preferred against the order of Justice G.R. Swaminathan, who directed the Subramaniya Swamy temple management to light the Karthigai Deepam at the deepathoon besides the usual places, and other connected appeals.

title: Unemployment rate falls to 4.7% in November, lowest since April: Government survey
content: The PLFS stated that the overall Labour Force Participation Rate increased to 55.8% in November, the highest level recorded since April.

title: In Kerala, Modi government favouring Adani group in highway road projects: Venugopal
content: Claiming a “highway scam”, the Congress MP says that from Kasaragod in the north to Kollam in the south, National Highway projects, two major stretches NH 66 and NH 544, are collapsing before the eyes of the public

title: KPCC president calls MGNREGS renaming an Insult to Mahatma Gandhi
content: Joseph says that the move not only disrespects Gandhi’s contributions but also risks destabilising a vital employment guarantee programme that has been crucial for rural livelihoods since its inception in 2005.

title: Beypore gears up for water fest
content: Contestants from five countries are expected to take part in the kite festival, one of the major attractions of water fest; cycle rally from Kozhikode to Beypore on December 25 to herald the start of the festival

title: Flagg youngest ever to score 40 as Mavs fall in OT
content: Mavericks rookie Cooper Flagg became the youngest player in NBA history to score 40 points after he dropped 42 in an overtime loss Monday.

title: Chiefs' Mahomes has surgery for torn ACL, LCL
content: Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes underwent successful surgery Monday in Dallas to repair the tear in his left ACL. A league source told ESPN that Mahomes also had a torn LCL that was repaired.

title: Rodgers says win made extra special by 'castoffs'
content: Aaron Rodgers grinned as he shouted out the names of his teammates who helped the Steelers beat the Dolphins on Monday night -- Kenneth Gainwell, Connor Heyward, Marquez Valdes-Scantling, Asante Samuel Jr., Adam Thielen. They all had something in common.

title: Texas QB Manning to return for 2026 season
content: Texas quarterback Arch Manning will return to school to play in 2026, finally putting to rest questions about his future beyond this season.

title: Interim coach says U-M's players feel 'betrayed'
content: Michigan interim coach Biff Poggi said Monday his players feel betrayed and angry following the firing and arrest of former coach Sherrone Moore.

title: Rockets' Udoka lashes out at refs after OT loss
content: Rockets coach Ime Udoka was critical of the officiating after his team's OT loss to the Nuggets, calling out the crew for inconsistent calls.

title: Washington claims first NCAA men's soccer title
content: Harrison Bertos scored 1:54 into overtime after Washington let a two-goal lead slip against North Carolina State to earn its first Men's College Cup national championship.

title: 🔎 Steelers subtly troll Fins after MNF win
content: NFL teams remained petty in Week 15 with the Pittsburgh Steelers poking fun at the Miami Dolphins after a huge home win.

title: What move should your team make? Trade questions for all 30 franchises
content: With NBA trade season upon us, Bobby Marks examines the conversations happening across all 30 front offices.

title: Which NBA players can be traded? We have the full team-by-team lists
content: Bobby Marks runs through every roster, mapping out which players can and cannot be traded before Feb. 5.

title: Barnwell on two knee injuries with big implications: What now for the Packers, Chiefs?
content: Micah Parsons and Patrick Mahomes both suffered significant knee injuries Sunday. What do they mean for the Packers' playoff push and the Chiefs' offseason plans?

title: 'I'm not even in the top 28. I'm not in the top 29': MLB managers on rule changes, clutch players and each other

title: In Special Gesture, Jordan Crown Prince Drives PM Modi To Museum
content: Jordanian Crown Prince Al Hussein bin Abdullah II on Tuesday personally drove Prime Minister Narendra Modi to the Jordan Museum here, in a special gesture reflecting the warmth of ties between India and the Arab nation.

title: Delhi Woman, 23, Found Dead At Home, Cops Suspect Suicide
content: A 23-year-old woman was found dead in her house in Delhi's Prem Nagar area, with police suspecting it to be a case of suicide, an official said on Tuesday.

title: Hyderabad Man Loses Rs 75 Lakh In Online Betting Fraud Lasting 4 Years
content: A 32-year-old man from Hyderabad has lost Rs 75 lakh after falling prey to online betting fraud, not once, but twice. It all began with a WhatsApp message from an unknown number promoting online betting games and promising easy profits.

title: Adani Foundation Observes Energy Conservation Day With Students In Mumbai
content: Since 2021, Project Utthan has been successfully run under a public-private partnership between BMC, Adani Foundation, and Adani Electricity.

title: Strong Winds Topple Statue Of Liberty - It's Not The One In New York
content: A nearly 40-metre-tall replica of the Statue of Liberty tumbled after a severe storm smashed the Brazilian city of Guaiba on Monday afternoon.

title: Luthra Brothers Deportation Live Updates: Luthras, Deported From Bangkok, To Land In Delhi Soon
content: Luthra brothers are being brought back on an IndiGo flight (6E1064) - which is scheduled to arrive at the Delhi airport at 1:45 pm (IST).

title: Bengaluru Techie Sells Her Flat, 2 Plots To Pay Fake Cops Rs 2 Crore
content: She received a call from a person posing as a courier official, who claimed that a suspicious piece of baggage linked to her Aadhaar card had been seized.

title: 13 Burnt To Death In Multi-Car Pile-Up On Delhi-Agra Expressway Amid Fog
content: At least 13 people were killed and several others were injured in a major road accident on the Delhi-Agra Expressway in Mathura on Tuesday morning after seven buses and three cars collided due to dense fog.

title: "Felt Good To Hear Masood Azhar Cry": Ex J&K Police Chief On Leaked Audio
content: Most wanted terrorist Masood Azhar breaking down during a speech while recalling his time in jail in Jammu and Kashmir is proof that terrorists face their worst nightmare in India, former Jammu and Kashmir Police chief SP Vaid told NDTV.

title: US Offers Security Deal In Ukraine Talks But Territory Still Key
content: The Trump administration offered to provide Ukraine with strong "Article 5-like" security guarantees - a reference to NATO's mutual defense clause.

title: US Embassy In Dhaka Warns Of Violence Ahead Of Bangladesh Elections
content: The United States Embassy in Dhaka has issued a nationwide security alert for American citizens following Bangladesh's announcement that its next parliamentary election and a national referendum will be held simultaneously on February 12, 2026.

title: Indian Woman, 60, In US For 30 Years, Detained During Green Card Interview
content: A 60-year-old Indian origin woman was detained in the United States by immigration officers during the last round of her green card interview.

title: Punjab Declares Amritsar, Anandpur Sahib, Talwandi Sabo As Holy Cities
content: The Punjab government has declared the walled city of Amritsar, Sri Anandpur Sahib in Rupnagar district, and Talwandi Sabo in Bathinda district as Holy Cities of the state, imposing wide-ranging restrictions to preserve their religious sanctity.

title: Al-Husseiniya: The Jordan Palace Where PM Modi Dined With King Abdullah II
content: PM Modi will hold talks with King Abdullah II to review India-Jordan relations and discuss regional developments.

title: "Brown University Issue": Trump Deflects Blame From FBI, Shooter On Run
content: Authorities in Providence, Rhode Island, said Monday they hadn't identified any new persons of interest in the shooting that killed two people and injured nine on the Ivy League campus Saturday afternoon.

title: 58 Lakh Names Deleted In Bengal Draft SIR: 24 Lakh Dead, 12 Lakh Missing
content: In a development likely to raise a political storm in poll-bound West Bengal, a total of 58 lakh names have been deleted from the state's draft voter list after the Special Intensive Revision to weed out duplication and errors

title: Rupee Breaches 91-Mark Against US Dollar For First Time In Intra-Day Trade
content: The rupee plunged 36 paise to breach the 91-mark against the US dollar for the first time in intra-day trade on Tuesday, weighed down by sustained FII outflows and a lack of clarity on the India-US trade deal.

title: US Plans To Reduce Number Of G20 Finance Minister Meetings: Report
content: The move may also reflect President Donald Trump's approach of prioritizing bilateral engagement over increasingly complex multilateral gatherings.

content: Hungover Russian drivers and other unforeseen hurdles nearly disrupted Ukraine's audacious drone strike on Moscow, but Operation Spiders Web ultimately succeeded.
